name: Smugglers' Cave
description:
This is my entry for the Ludum Dare 48 hour competition, theme: Connected Worlds.

Your secret cave is being flooded! Save as many boxes of loot as you can by teleporting them to the outside world and the waiting boat, before the rising tide inundates you.

Controls:

Use W, A & D to move the player around the cave, avoiding the water;

S to teleport a box to the outside world;

Left & right buttons to move the boat and catch the boxes;

Space to pause;

Escape to return to the menu.

Thank you for playing
